Text:
Yeah, I saw this one, it's originally from Discovery..... I think :)
Anyway, even though it's not so focused on the Holy Grail, and the title might imply, it's still interessting. Maybe it should be called "Hitler's search for the Holy Grail and other religious/occult artifacts".

I like it!

I saw 10 min of one of these programs but turned of the tv since i thought it would not cover the matters with any seriosity when they played horrorfilmmusic constant for those10 minuits. I have allready read this from the sorce.
